Need some help?

  • How do I know you're going to send me something I like?

    • We do a discovery call with every customer to discuss their requirements, sizes, likes and dislikes in detail. It's actually more expensive for us to send you stuff you won't like and you return it, so we try and get it right first time.
    • In the rare scenario that you'd like to return something, it's easy to get a refund or an exchange in your next package. Click here for info on how to return something.

  • How do I contact you?

    • You can contact us via email at help@getbrandid.com, we will always get back to you within 24 hours, but usually much earlier
    • You can call us on +44 (0) 203 322 2882

  • Do you ship to my location?

    • Please see our UK shipping policy if you live in the UK
    • Please see our International shipping policy if you live outside the UK, click here if you live outside Europe

  • How do I get a full or partial refund or exchange?

    • Please click here for information on UK and International returns and exchanges
  • What's the difference between store credit and reward points?
    • Reward points is money you've earned from our loyalty programme, and is convertible to cash. Store credit is a refund that you've stored in your account as credit towards your next purchase.
